title: Number of assaults by weapon U.S. 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Weapon used in the x axis and Number of assaults in the y axis.
Weapon used Other weapon has the highest Number of assaults and Knife or cutting instrument has the lowest Number of assaults.
There is a difference of 100744.0 between the maximum Weapon used Other weapon and minimum Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Weapon used in the x axis and Number of assaults in the y axis.
Weapon used Other weapon has the highest Number of assaults and Knife or cutting instrument has the lowest Number of assaults.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Weapon used in the x axis and Number of assaults in the y axis.
Weapon used Other weapon has the highest Number of assaults and Knife or cutting instrument has the lowest Number of assaults.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of assaults for 4 number of Weapon useds.
The Number of assaults is appeared to be the highest at Weapon used Other weapon and lowest at Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument.
The minimum Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument has got 1.82 times less Number of assaults than the maximum Weapon used Other weapon.
The Weapon used Other weapon has the highest Number of assaults, followed by , and Personal weapons. Down to the Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument which is the lowest.
The Weapon used Other weapon has 1.26 times more Number of assaults than average.
The Number of assaults is 711695.0 if we add up values of all Weapon useds.
